title: Tottenham set to be offered Adrien Rabiot as part of Christian Eriksen transfer
text:

Christian Eriksen is reportedly being targeted by Serie A champions Juventus , and manager Maurizio Sarri is thought to be willing to offer Spurs Adrien Rabiot in any deal for the 27-year-old.

Eriksen has been linked with a move away from north London ever since he declared his desire for a "new challenge" over the summer.

His performances this season have not been up to his normal standard, and with his contract set to expire at the end of the current campaign Eriksen is highly unlikely to be at the club beyond June.

Juve could swoop with an offer for the Dane in January, and according to French publication Le10Sport (via Football Italia ) former PSG man Rabiot could be offered as a makeweight in the deal.

(Image: Juventus FC via Getty Images)

Rabiot only joined Juventus during the summer but has so far struggled for first-team opportunities in Turin, making just three appearances in Serie A at the start of the season.

The 24-year-old is currently behind the likes of Miralem Pjanic, Sami Khedira and Aaron Ramsey in the pecking order, and he is thought to be becoming impatient with his lack of starts, and could be interested in a move to Spurs, where he may be more likely to get playing time.

The deal mooted is probably also an appealing one for Spurs, who risk losing Eriksen on a free at the end of the season, and chairman Daniel Levy is thought to be desperate to cash in on the player before it is too late.

(Image: Getty Images)

Rabiot is a player who splits opinion. While his talent is undoubted, he has a reputation as a difficult player to manage, and he sat out of the whole second half of PSG's campaign last season after falling out with the club over his contract.

He was also suspended after going to a nightclub after the side's loss to Manchester United in the Champions League in March.
description: Eriksen has long been linked with a move away from Spurs and Juventus are the latest club to be touted with a move for the playmaker
